nodes.text: Restelly Quist was a female individual who held the title of Chief Librarian of the Jedi Archives.

Restelly Quist was reintroduced into the new Star Wars canon in the 2019 audiobook original Dooku: Jedi Lost, written by Cavan Scott. The character was originally detailed in the Star Wars Legends continuity in the 2010 reference book The Jedi Path: A Manual for Students of the Force, written by Daniel Wallace.
